item.title: 在绿色和平组织的故乡，不列颠哥伦比亚省的气候目标面临选举逆流
item.description: 这位加拿大第三大省的政治新贵因对气候科学持怀疑态度而被原党派开除，但他承诺放弃环保目标，放开自然资源开发，赢得政权指日可待。【原文：An unlikely political upstart in Canada’s third-largest province, expelled from his previous party for climate science skepticism, is within striking distance of winning power with promises to ditch environmental targets and unleash natural-resources development.】

item.title: Zelle 称今年上半年汇款业务猛增 27
item.description: 点对点汇款应用 Zelle 称，今年上半年网络交易额猛增 27%，支付总额接近 5000 亿美元。【原文：Zelle, the peer-to-peer money transfer app, said network transactions jumped 27% during the first half of the year, with payments totaling almost $500 billion.】

item.title: 马斯克用视频反击特斯拉机器人的反击，声称取得了进步
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）在上周的一次活动中，通过一段视频展示了其机器人原型在自行移动方面取得的进展，以此回应外界对其机器人依赖远程人类操作员的批评。【原文：Tesla Inc. responded to blowback over its robots relying on remote human operators at an event last week with a video demonstrating the progress its prototypes are making in moving around on their own.】

item.title: PAI Partners 拟提高对赛诺菲消费品部门的收购报价
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，PAI Partners 已提交了一份对赛诺菲消费保健业务的改进报价，这可能是今年欧洲最大交易之一的一个转折点。【原文：PAI Partners has submitted an improved offer for Sanofi’s consumer health business, according to people familiar with the matter, a potential twist to one of the biggest deals in Europe this year.】

item.title: 日元跌至 150 点关键水平，引发更多干预风险
item.description: 日元汇率下滑，触及 1 美元兑 150 日元的关键心理价位，使日本采取干预措施的风险再次成为焦点。【原文：The yen slid to touch the key psychological level of 150 per dollar, bringing the risk of intervention by Japan back into focus.】

item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数在前一周因暴风雨大幅飙升后有所下降
item.description: 受飓风 "海伦 "影响，美国东南部各州的失业救济金申请人数在前一周大幅上升后意外下降，未来几周的数据很可能继续波动。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell after jumping the previous week in Southeastern states affected by Hurricane Helene, and data will probably remain volatile in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行计划进行与 10 亿英镑英国消费者贷款相关的风险转移
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）正就其英国分行约 10 亿英镑（13 亿美元）贷款组合可能发生的重大风险转移与投资者进行接触。【原文：Banco Santander SA is reaching out to investors about a potential significant risk transfer linked to a portfolio of about £1 billion ($1.3 billion) of loans out of its UK unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行第三次降息支撑疲软经济
item.description: 欧洲中央银行今年第三次降低利率，因为通胀的急剧回落使其能够为该地区停滞不前的经济提供支持。【原文：The European Central Bank lowered interest rates for the third time this year as a hastier retreat in inflation allows it to offer support to the region’s stuttering economy.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称波兰可能在 2025 年年中开始逐步降息
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，波兰可能会在明年年中开始逐步降息，但建议各国央行行长在整个 2025 年期间保持货币政策紧缩，因为存在巨大的通胀风险。【原文：The International Monetary Fund said Poland may start gradual interest rate cuts in the middle of next year, but advised central bankers to keep monetary policy tight throughout 2025 because of significant inflation risks.】

item.title: 匈牙利宣布利率 "持续暂停"，福林走强
item.description: 匈牙利央行副行长巴纳巴斯-维拉格（Barnabas Virag）表示，如果通胀前景和全球市场需要，匈牙利央行准备在 "持续一段时间内 "暂停降息。福林兑欧元上涨。【原文：Hungary’s central bank is ready to pause interest-rate cuts for a “sustained period” if the inflation outlook and global markets require it, Deputy Governor Barnabas Virag said. The forint rose against the euro.】

item.title: 达拉斯赌增长为 190 亿美元养老金提供资金
item.description: 达拉斯是美国发展最快的大都会区之一，也是金融工作的新兴强市，目前正处于建设热潮之中。【原文：Dallas is part of America’s fastest-growing metropolitan area, a burgeoning powerhouse for finance jobs that’s in the midst of a construction boom.】

item.title: 在创造了 26000% 的收益后，巴西对冲基金明星面临危机
item.description: 在圣保罗庞大的金融区，路易斯-斯图尔伯格（Luis Stuhlberger）是一个高高在上、近乎神话般的人物。【原文：On trading floors across Sao Paulo’s sprawling financial district, Luis Stuhlberger is a towering, almost mythical, figure.】

item.title: 深陷亏损泥潭加拿大住房投资者试图出售以弥补损失
item.description: Bawelaya Isho 准备结束他的房地产投资之旅。【原文：Bawelaya Isho is ready to end his foray into real estate investing.】

item.title: 阿布德恩建议在预算案前就英国印花税达成妥协
item.description: Abrdn Plc 在英国印花税的辩论中提出了一个中间立场，主张取消对非蓝筹股的印花税，因为在英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的首份预算案出台前，全面取消印花税的呼声已逐渐减弱。【原文：Abrdn Plc suggested a middle ground on the UK stamp-duty debate, advocating for the levy to be scrapped on non-bluechip shares as calls for full abolition of the levy fade ahead of Chancellor Rachel Reeves’s first budget.】

item.title: 英国对俄罗斯油轮船队实施最大规模制裁
item.description: 英国对俄罗斯石油和天然气运输船实施了新一轮制裁，并表示三个政府机构将采取行动，对在英吉利海峡为莫斯科运输燃料并投保可疑保险的船只提出质疑。【原文：The UK issued a fresh round of sanctions on Russian oil and gas carriers, and said three government bodies will act to challenge vessels hauling fuel for Moscow in the English Channel with dubious insurance.】

item.title: 液化天然气储罐过剩对面临高气价的消费者的打击有所缓解
item.description: 液化天然气运输船的建造速度快于新燃料的上市速度，这有助于降低运输成本，使消费者在今年冬天不必为能源支付更多费用。【原文：Ships that carry liquefied natural gas are being built faster than new supplies of the fuel can come to market, helping to lower transport costs and cushioning consumers from paying even more for energy this winter.】

item.title: 生物燃料热潮仍令美国大豆供应过剩
item.description:
尽管清洁燃料行业的需求不断扩大，但豆类却在创纪录的收成中堆积如山。【原文：

Despite demand from the expanding clean-fuel sector, beans are piling up amid a record harvest.

】

item.title: 据说合作伙伴正在权衡输送带制造商 Ammega 的各种选择
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Partners Group Holding AG 正在探索欧洲传送带制造商 Ammega 集团的战略选择，包括潜在的首次公开募股。【原文：Partners Group Holding AG is exploring strategic options for European conveyor-belt manufacturer Ammega Group, including a potential initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Neuralink 联合创始人的新创公司销售大脑计算机工具包
item.description:
马克斯-霍达克（Max Hodak）的公司 "科学"（Science）正在销售能让研究人员更轻松地探究大脑的设备和软件。【原文：

Max Hodak’s company, Science, is selling devices and software that make it easier for researchers to probe the mind.

】

item.title: Citadel 员工持有的基金股份四年内翻了三番，达到 90 亿美元
item.description: 在过去几年里，Citadel 员工对其价值 450 亿美元的旗舰对冲基金的投资激增，这主要得益于强劲的回报率和公司对员工年度报酬的一大部分进行锁定。【原文：Citadel employees’ investment in its $45 billion flagship hedge fund surged during the past several years, driven by robust returns and lockups that the firm imposes on a big chunk of their annual compensation.】

item.title: 据说 KKR 支持的 Vantage 正在考虑出售西班牙的电信塔
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由 KKR & Co.支持的电信塔所有者和运营商 Vantage Towers AG 正在考虑出售其在西班牙的资产。【原文：Vantage Towers AG, an owner and operator of telecom towers backed by KKR & Co., is considering a sale of its assets in Spain, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织认为干旱将赞比亚经济增长降至 25 年最低点
item.description: 除了在 2020 年疫情最严重的时候出现萎缩之外，赞比亚的经济扩张幅度可能是 1998 年以来最小的，原因是国际货币基金组织警告说，创纪录的干旱将阻碍经济增长，其影响比预期的要严重得多。【原文：Zambia’s economy will probably expand by the smallest amount since 1998 — besides a contraction during the height of the pandemic in 2020 — because of a worse-than-anticipated impact from a record drought that the International Monetary Fund warned will stunt growth.】

item.title: Adobe 支付现金以消除创作者对人工智能的担忧
item.description: Adobe 认为它已经找到了治疗人工智能工作焦虑症的方法：现金。但首先...【原文：Adobe thinks it has found a cure for AI job anxiety: cash. But first...】

item.title: 萨姆-奥特曼的能源 "新政 "对人工智能有利。美国人呢？
item.description:
OpenAI的创始人要求华盛顿在新发电厂上花费数千亿美元。社会也需要看到其中的益处。【原文：

OpenAI’s founder is asking Washington to spend hundreds of billions of dollars on new power plants. Society needs to see the benefit, too.

】

item.title: 美国大选让气候科技投资者进入观望模式
item.description:
由于融资方和创始人都在面对特朗普第二次当选总统的前景及其对减碳技术的影响，因此资本市场停滞不前。【原文：

Capital has stalled as financers and founders confront the prospect of a second Trump presidency and its impact on carbon-cutting technologies.

】

item.title: 库什-塔德的 7-Eleven 连锁店将面临美国联邦贸易委员会的怀疑性审查
item.description: 据彭博新闻社分析，Circle K 运营商 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. 如果继续以 472 亿美元收购竞争对手 7-Eleven 所有者 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Circle K operator Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. is likely to face a tough US antitrust review if it moves forward with its $47.2 billion bid to buy rival 7-Eleven owner Seven & i Holdings Co., according to a Bloomberg News analysis.】

item.title: Blackstone 的信贷部门现已成为其最重要的业务部门，为其利润推波助澜
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 第三季度利润增长，原因是其信贷部门受到投资者现金流入的推动，成为其资产规模最大的业务。【原文：Blackstone Inc. posted an increase in third-quarter profit as its credit arm was boosted by an influx of investor cash and became its biggest business by assets.】

item.title: 电信市场困难重重，诺基亚在华裁员近 2000 人
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，芬兰诺基亚公司将在中国裁员近2000人，作为该公司应对电信设备市场疲软的全面成本削减计划的一部分。【原文：Nokia Oyj is to cut almost 2,000 jobs in China, as part of a sweeping cost-reduction program as the Finnish company grapples with a sluggish telecom equipment market, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 越南表示愿意下调主要利率以促进增长
item.description: 在超强台风 "八木 "造成破坏后，越南国家银行愿意继续下调政策利率以支持经济增长。【原文：The State Bank of Vietnam is open to continue cutting policy rates to support growth following the destruction caused by Super Typhoon Yagi.】

item.title: 萨南公司首席执行官称欧洲天然气仍易受干扰影响
item.description: 俄罗斯与欧洲的天然气过境协议可能终止，这对意大利的影响 "微乎其微"。不过，Snam SpA 公司首席执行官斯特凡诺-维尼耶（Stefano Venier）表示，由于欧洲大陆对进口货物的依赖性增加，意大利仍然很脆弱。【原文：The possible end of the Russian gas transit agreement to Europe will have a “very negligible” impact on Italy. Still, the continent remains vulnerable with its increased reliance on imported cargoes, according to Snam SpA Chief Executive Officer Stefano Venier.】
